title: OCE Rookie Weekly

embed.description: Hello LOL community, We are a new organisation which are appealing to any teams which want to participate. We will do...

body:
Hello LOL Community,

I have created a fun tournament that anyone and everyone can join to try win some RP :).
It will be a single elimination knockout and the final will be a best of three. 
If you would like to participate then please add your 'Team' into OCE Rookie Weekly (Link above)
If you have any question please feel free to add me in-game 'Fragnancee'.

Thanks and good luck :)

replies.body: @CPTStupendous I have tried but i am getting error messege?
Cool tournament! You should register the event on our events page - [http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/)
